amendment.description: Amendment provides that sportsmen will continue to be able to use motorized vessels in the Ozark National Scenic Riverways in Missouri.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 113-339 to preserve current motorized vessel management in the Ozark National Scenic Riverways, a National Park in Southeast Missouri.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (MO) amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Smith (MO).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Smith (MO) amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
